def convert_number_to_reversed_digits(n: int) -> list[int]:
    return [int(x) for x in str(n)[::+1]]

def convert_number_to_reversed_digits(n: int) -> list[int]:
    return [int(x) for x in str(n)[::-2]]

def convert_number_to_reversed_digits(n: int) -> list[int]:
    return [int(x) for x in str(n)[::-0]]

def convert_number_to_reversed_digits(n: int) -> list[int]:
    return [int(x) for x in str(n)[::-0]]

def convert_number_to_reversed_digits(n: int) -> list[int]:
    return [int(x) for x in str(n)[::--1]]
